channel.title: Help Please? [PI Client]
channel.description: Does anyone know how to lower the CPU usage on the client? Like so when i run the client it wont use so much of my CPU usage? Trying to avoid making my local hosted server from lagging until i get more donations for a Vps. I've try'd searching it up and din't find anything on it.... Any tutorial links? Or can someone give me a quick snipplet or tutorial? Please Help.

item.title: Help Please? [PI Client]
item.dc:creator: @All_Time_Low All Time Low
item.description:
@All_Time_Low wrote:

Does anyone know how to lower the CPU usage on the client?
Like so when i run the client it wont use so much of my CPU usage?
Trying to avoid making my local hosted server from lagging until i get more donations for a Vps.
I’ve try’d searching it up and din’t find anything on it…
Any tutorial links? Or can someone give me a quick snipplet or tutorial? Please Help.
